other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm, an incomplete left bundle-branch block, and multiple premature atrial contractions.
Severe, dense calcification of the pericardium.

other_tests.procedure_name: Simultaneous right and left heart catheterization
other_tests.findings: Elevation and equalization of diastolic pressures with characteristic dip and plateau.

other_tests.procedure_name: Cardiac catheterization with phrenic-to-phrenic nerve pericardial stripping
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 1 month follow-up, dyspnea had been relieved and recovery was without difficulties.
